nodes.text: There is lack of evidence about Person's X guilt
Person X erased evidence of guilt
Person X is tasked to recruiting new militants
Person X is related to Person Y
If there is lack of evidence about someone's guilt, then he/she erased evidence of guilt
If someone is tasked to recruiting new militants and he is related to another person, then the first is recruiting the second

CQ: Is it possible to exist other evidence of guilt elsewhere?
Is this the only reason justifying the lack of evidence?
Is there evidence that he is tasked to recruiting new militants?
Is there any possibility that these two have a different kind of relation?
Are there any other evidence that prove the recruitment attempt?
